title: Express & Standard Delivery
description: Fast and reliable parcel delivery within 24–72 hours in major cities like Dhaka, Chittagong, Sylhet, Khulna, and Rajshahi. Express delivery in Dhaka is completed within 4–6 hours from pick-up to drop-off.

title: Nationwide Delivery
description: We provide secure nationwide delivery with home drop-off in all districts of Bangladesh. Orders typically reach customers within 48–72 hours.

title: Fulfillment Solution
description: We offer complete fulfillment services including inventory management, order processing, packaging, and after-sales support to streamline your business operations.

title: Cash on Home Delivery
description: Deliver your products safely across Bangladesh with our 100% cash-on-delivery service, giving customers the option to pay upon receiving the item.

title: Corporate Service / Contract In Logistics
description: Customized logistics solutions for businesses including contract-based services, warehouse storage, and inventory support for efficient operations.

title: Parcel Return
description: Our reverse logistics system allows customers to easily return or exchange items, helping online merchants manage returns smoothly and efficiently.
